title: Party Girl
summaries: The Party Girl is a pre-Hardmode NPC vendor who sells festive novelty items and furniture.

Unlike other town NPCs, the Party Girl only has a 2.5*1/40 (2.5%) chance to be eligible for spawning in every 2-minute interval, during which she is subject to regular NPC spawn rate, once the criteria below are met. In other words, she will take on average 40 times longer to spawn than regular NPCs. Said criteria require that:

• There is an empty house.
  • 14 / [img:Nintendo 3DS version] 12 / 8 other town NPCs are in the world. Note that while the Old Man, Traveling Merchant, and town pets count towards this total, the Skeleton Merchant does not.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, if the Party Girl is killed, she will respawn with normal spawn chances instead of being rarer. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, she will still follow the lower chance when respawning.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the Party Girl will defend herself against nearby enemies by throwing Happy Grenades at them, dealing 30 / <abbr class="expert" title="Expert Mode">45</abbr> / <abbr class="master" title="Master Mode">52</abbr> damage at the start of the game, and (on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version) as players progress she will gain various stat increases. She will also occasionally throw confetti at the player. Sometimes she may drop a large quantity of Happy Grenades upon her death.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, when talked to during a natural Party, she will give the first player to talk to her a Slice of Cake.

statistics.Damage: 304552 (Happy Grenades)
